thread.title: VCU fan going ham while holding sleeping baby is the March Madness dad of the year
thread.title_full: VCU fan going ham while holding sleeping baby is the March Madness dad of the year

author: Morgan Moriarty
title: VCU fan going ham while holding sleeping baby is the March Madness dad of the year
text:
He is the No. 1 overall seed, and it’s not even close. 
It’s the NCAA Tournament, and fans everywhere are getting out on the road to show their support for their favorite college basketball team. During a First Round game between No. 7 St. Mary’s and No. 10 VCU, TBS’ cameras caught a glimpse of a beautiful VCU fan, whom I personally believe should be given the No. 1 overall seed for father of the year. 
Apparently this Ram fan and his daughter are regulars at VCU games with his daughter — his Twitter handle is VCU Papa, and they go to games regularly. Look at these two living their best lives, folks. 
Showtime pic.twitter.com/OBWppfvFbz 
— VCU Papa (@VCUPav) March 16, 2017 #RamsOnTheRoad #RamsOnThePlane pic.twitter.com/9gxn2uzrnQ 
— VCU Papa (@VCUPav) March 15, 2017 #ootd pic.twitter.com/WFmIOf9gMC 
— VCU Papa (@VCUPav) March 12, 2017 Game face pic.twitter.com/UH4aGpZ4Y2 
— VCU Papa (@VCUPav) March 11, 2017 And speaking of his Twitter handle, his header photo is one of the cutest dang things I have ever seen. 
Via @VCUPav VCU looks like it may not win this one against St. Mary’s but shoutout to this dad for giving us a hilarious moment during the First Round games. We salute you, Ram Dad.
